metadata.title: Characterization of Zooplankton Community and Size Composition in Relation to Hydrography and Circulation in the Sea of Japan

creators.name: U.S. Navy, Office of Naval Research

metadata.description: To provide a better understanding of how boreal and tropical zooplankton communities maintain themselves in a dynamic physical environment.
metadata.notes:
